subject: Solheim Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Lexi Thompson and Cristie Kerr earned a point for the United States, which trailed Europe, 8-5, in the Solheim Cup before the other fourball matches were suspended because of darkness in St. Leon-Rot, Germany.
snippet: Lexi Thompson and Cristie Kerr earned a point for the United States, which trailed Europe, 8-5, in the Solheim Cup before the other fourball matches were suspended because of darkness in St. Leon-Rot, Germany.
